nodes.text: This Nysillin farm was a nysillin farm located on Felucia. It was captured by the Nuro Pirates, who were supplying the Confederacy of Independent Systems with nysillin during the Third battle of Felucia. During the battle, the famed Clone commando RC-1138 commissioned a Jedi Knight to defeat Yorn Nuro, the leader of the Nuro Pirates. Captain Carg of Graul Company also ordered the Jedi Knight to eliminate some of the Nuro Pirates around the farm.
